pages.text: $(#0BE334)Item Added In Simply More$(br2)$()The Scarab Roller is a seemingly unmagical khopesh imbued with a mystical scarab, an ancient sigil of protection. The scarab is living, magically encasing the weapon in an aura of resistance. The scarabâ€™s carapace oftentimes begins to encase the user,
hardening their skin and making it less susceptible to attacks. The scarab's wings are able to propell wielders forwards at great speeds, directly through crowds.
